channel.title: 2 Easy RSC Questions
channel.description:
Hey, I'm just wondering a couple of things. I searched them both on the forums and I couldn't find any solutions.
My first question is, how do I see the ID of a specific NPC? I went to NpcLoc.xml to remove Master Fisher but everything is listed as an ID. I went from that to NPC Def and there it lists the names but not the ID's humph... :( Anyone know how I can get the name with ID?
Second question is how to remove the duping glitch/glitches from Easy RSC. No point in releasing a server where all the oldies drop in and start duping all the best items. Would put a real kink in my plans.
Thanks for any help you can give, hopefully I can get them resolved.

item.title: 2 Easy RSC Questions
item.dc:creator: @Zecronious Zecronious
item.description:
@Zecronious wrote:

I’m not really interested in DQ. They made a lot of changes to the game and it would be so much more work to get it back to normal RSC than to just fix Easy RSC.

Still looking for help with how to fix the dupes in Easy RSC.

Read full topic

item.title: 2 Easy RSC Questions
item.dc:creator: @Wife_Beater Wife Beater
item.description:
@Wife_Beater wrote:

[quote=“Zecronious, post:1, topic:475156”]Hey, I’m just wondering a couple of things. I searched them both on the forums and I couldn’t find any solutions.

My first question is, how do I see the ID of a specific NPC? I went to NpcLoc.xml to remove Master Fisher but everything is listed as an ID. I went from that to NPC Def and there it lists the names but not the ID’s humph… Anyone know how I can get the name with ID?

Second question is how to remove the duping glitch/glitches from Easy RSC. No point in releasing a server where all the oldies drop in and start duping all the best items. Would put a real kink in my plans.

Thanks for any help you can give, hopefully I can get them resolved.[/quote]

I suggest you use DarkQuest. Its mostly bug free and much more stable

you can svn check it out by downloading SVN Tortoise and "svn"ing this site http://subversion.assembla.com/svn/darkquest/

Read full topic

item.title: 2 Easy RSC Questions
item.dc:creator: @imthenull imthenull
item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

Pretty sure noobscape comes with an id list. Nonetheless, when an admin right clicks on pretty much anything it will show that entity’s id

Read full topic

Hey, I’m just wondering a couple of things. I searched them both on the forums and I couldn’t find any solutions.
